title: UN Security Council voices ‘dismay’ over Israeli settlements
description: Watered-down statement replaces draft resolution that would have explicitly condemned Israel's settlement activities.

title: Prosecutors downgrade charges in Alec Baldwin shooting case
description: Prosecutors dropped a firearms enhancement that would have established a minimum sentence of five years.

title: Can Air India break the monopoly of major Gulf players?
description: India's national carrier seals the biggest deal in aviation history.

title: Wagner owner alleges Russian military denying ammo to mercenaries
description: Founder of military firm accuses officials of denying his fighters sufficient ammunition as part of an ongoing rivalry.

title: How the US reacted to Biden’s visit to Ukraine
description: Far-right US lawmakers criticise the president's trip to Kyiv, arguing that Biden should prioritise domestic issues.

title: Mass protests as Israel moves ahead with judicial ‘reform’
description: Sweeping judicial changes, cornerstone of PM Netanyahu's far-right government, to get first reading in Knesset.

title: Brazil rescue efforts continue as Lula visits areas hit by floods
description: President Lula says that Sao Paulo region can 'count on the federal government' after flooding killed at least 36.

title: How can the US avoid a repeat of the Ohio rail disaster?
description: Safety standards along rail network are in focus as East Palestine residents worry about exposure to toxic chemicals.

title: Fault Lines wins George Polk Award for film on Abu Akleh killing
description: Documentary by Al Jazeera English's programme details the killing of the renowned correspondent by Israeli forces.

title: New magnitude 6.4 earthquake rocks southern Turkey
description: Aftershock in Hatay province was at a depth of 2km (1.2 miles), the European Mediterranean Seismological Centre says.

title: ‘Anger, sorrow, anxiety’: Healing scars of Turkey’s quake victims
description: Experts say psychosocial programmes should be enacted to help survivors cope with trauma and go back to routine life.

title: Why the world needs a deal to protect its oceans
description: Talks in New York seek to safeguard the seas, their huge range of biodiversity and oxygen that sustains life on Earth.

title: ‘Partial independence’: Kosovo reflects on secession from Serbia
description: Independence was a dream come true, but building a future is taking longer than expected, Albanian Kosovars say.

title: Tunisia’s Ennahdha party says leader summoned for questioning
description: Ghannouchi, speaker of dissolved parliament, told to appear at police station after arrests of president's critics.

title: With new football shirt, Irish club shows support for Palestine
description: Irish top-flight club Bohemian FC aims to create awareness about the Palestinian cause.

title: Grassroots fundraising efforts grow for Turkey-Syria quakes
description: Several communities across the world - already dealing with their own hardships - have launched fundraising efforts.

title: PA ‘backtracks’ on UN resolution against Israel amid US pressure
description: The UAE, which had drafted the resolution, has dropped the vote apparently amid US pressure.

title: Bangladesh shuts down main opposition party’s newspaper
description: Bengali-language Dainik Dinkal has been the mouthpiece of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party for more than three decades.

description: US president meets Ukrainian counterpart in a show of solidarity before the first anniversary of Russia's invasion.

title: Iran’s currency hits all-time low as EU prepares more sanctions
description: Iranian rial crosses 500,000 to the US dollar as prices of food and essentials continue to rise.

title: US urges Nordics’ accession to NATO in Turkey visit
description: The US secretary of state says Finland and Sweden have already taken 'concrete steps' to meet Ankara's requests.

title: China slams Blinken’s comments on Russia-Ukraine war
description: China says it will not accept US 'pointing fingers' after Blinken said Beijing is considering providing arms to Russia.

title: Iran ‘strongly rejects’ Israeli claims on oil tanker attack
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blamed Iran for attacking its oil tanker in the Arabian Sea on February 10.

description: Violence has erupted in a city at the centre of dispute between Somalia's semi-autonomous Somaliland & Puntland regions.

title: Teenage barber tidies up in Turkey’s earthquake camp
description: Hamo, 18, is offering open-air haircuts to his family and others displaced by the disaster.

title: Mauritius grounds flights as it braces for Cyclone Freddy
description: Flights halted and stock exchange shut as tropical cyclone approaches, posing 'direct threat' to Indian Ocean island.

title: Broken wires, faulty renovation caused India bridge mishap: Probe
description: Probe into deadly collapse of suspension bridge in Gujarat's Morbi finds several structural and operational violations.

title: Where does the Iran nuclear deal stand right now?
description: With a lot of ups and downs, there were numerous reports of near breakdowns or imminent deals throughout last year.

title: Joe Biden makes unannounced visit to Ukraine’s Kyiv

title: Meta to roll out paid subscription on Facebook, Instagram

title: IMF to crisis-hit Pakistan: Tax the rich, protect the poor

description: Neither side looks set for a decisive victory any time soon, writes Al Jazeera's defence analyst.

title: Eritrea’s ‘diaspora tax’ is funding violence and oppression

title: Taiwan’s KMT hopes for elections boost after China trip

title: Floods, landslides kill dozens in Brazil’s Sao Paulo state

title: Iran denies enriching uranium to 84 percent purity amid IAEA row
